column2: p <- ggplot(MDF_long,aes(x=AbnormalityScore, fill=Xpert2Outcome_num))+ geom_histogram(position = 'stack', alpha=0.5, breaks=seq(0,100, by=5), aes(y = ..density.., fill = Xpert2Outcome_num)) + xlab("Abnormality Scores of the Deep Learning Systems") + scale_fill_discrete(name ="", labels = c("Xpert Negative", "Xpert Positive"))
hist <- p + facet_wrap(~DeepLearningSystem) + theme_minimal() + theme(legend.position = "bottom")+ scale_color_brewer(palette="Accent")
